WELCOME TO YOUR PERSONAL AREA

The patient and family care study is a written report of individualized nursing care carried out or rendered through identification of their needs within a specific period of time. The care study serves as an approach which lays emphasis on comprehensive and detailed study of patient’s diagnosis, treatment, health needs and challenges identified. This focuses on the patient, family, community where she/he resides and health care team with their active participation in care given to achieve set goals in order to promote wellness.
